text: Lawrence Samuel "Larry" Storch (January 8, 1923 - July 8, 2022) was an American movie, television, stage, and voice actor and comedian. He was known for his roles as Randolph Agarn in F Troop and as the voice of the Joker in some Batman specials as well as 2 Scooby-Doo/Batman specials. Storch was born in New York City, New York. Storch was married to Norma Catherine Greve from 1961 until her death in 2003. Storch had three children. Storch died on July 8, 2022 in New York City from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease, aged 99. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Larry Storch page Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Actors from New York City Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease
title: Larry Storch
